message: Hi Bob, I'm offering my product to you for $18000. I believe it's a great deal, and I'm confident it will be very valuable to you. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $14000. I believe this is a fair price for the product, considering its value to me.

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, and I appreciate your counteroffer.  However, $14000 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $16000.  This still leaves room for us both to get a good price, but it also reflects the true value of the product. Let's see if we can come to an agreement.

I understand your concerns, and I appreciate your willingness to come down on the price. However, $16000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $15500. I think this is a fair compromise that reflects the value of the product to me.
